flavor: "With two eyes you see my face. With three you could see my heart."
name: Jojen Reed
text: Stealth. Reaction: After Jojen Reed stands, reveal the top card of each player's deck. You may either: discard each of those cards, or have each player draw 1 card.

flavor: The solar was as damp and drafty as ever.
name: King Balon's Solar
text: Reaction: After you win initiative, gain 1 gold.
